eu.hydrologis.jgrass.uibuilder.swing
Class SwingSpreadsheetLayout

java.lang.Object
  eu.hydrologis.jgrass.uibuilder.swing.SwingSpreadsheetLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.LayoutManager, java.awt.LayoutManager2
public class SwingSpreadsheetLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.LayoutManager2

A custom LayoutManager which allows us to place the children on the client area in an easy but advanced way.

Author:
Patrick Ohnewein

getSpan

private static Span getSpan(java.util.ArrayList<Span> spanList,
                            int index)
Returns the span with the given index contained in the given array list.

Parameters:
spanList - ArrayList with the spans.
index - Index of the span to return.
Returns:
The span with the given index or null, if none of the contained spans has the specified index.

validateLayout

private void validateLayout(java.awt.Container parent)
Checks if the layout has to be recalculated and if there is the need, it recalculates it.

Parameters:
parent - The parent container of the children components.
